Title: Where tigers crouch and dragons coil, the present defeats the past
Designer: Jiangsu Province Revolutionary Art School (江苏省革命文艺学校)
Publisher: Jiangsu sheng geming weiyuanhui chuban faxing ju	(江苏省革命委员会出版发行局)
Notes: The title of the poster is from Mao Zedong's poem The PLA Captures Nanjing (人民解放军占领南京), written April 1949 on occasion of the crossing of the Yangzi river by the army in the final stages of the Civil War."Where tigers crouch and dragons coil" is also a metaphor for dangerous terrain.
Theme: The Yangzi River Bridge in Nanjing
